text: God nɨbop gek chɨb gup anɨb ak, nɨbi gos nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb. Ak nɨbop gek, nɨbi tɨkjakɨl, takaw nɨm akal nɨbop takaw tɨmel apal ak, kɨles gɨl nɨgtep gɨl pen apɨm. Nɨbop gek, nɨbi bɨ gɨ tɨmel gup ak nop ag gɨpɨm. Nɨbop gek, nɨbi God nop pɨlɨkɨpɨm. Nɨbop gek, nɨbi gos awl yɨbɨl yɨp nɨgun agɨl nepɨm. Nɨbop gek, nɨbi yad ayɨp jɨmñɨl yonɨgun agɨl gos nepɨm. Nɨbop gek, nɨbi bɨ gɨ tɨmel gup ak, kɨles gɨl nop agñɨtep gɨpɨm. Nɨbi anɨb okok agtep gɨnɨgun agɨl, gɨtep gem chɨnop anɨgɨl yomek, nɨbi asɨŋ olap ma mɨdeb.
